title: Super Galaxy Rumble Junkyard Titan Bug
body:
This was addressed back in September 2014 but the bug is back.

When Rumble Overheats with the Super galaxy Rumble skin his drill no longer turns hot/red and does the special auto attack animations. At all. Try it out. He just uses his normal auto attacking animations without the exaggerated squash and stretch on the drill. I would love this to be fixed since its one of the most satisfying parts of the legendary skin.

Bug: 
http://i.imgur.com/HyCNMdn.png

What it's SUPPOSED to look like: http://i.imgur.com/uuR2Xy2.png
